channel.title: uKnit quickstart on Codetab
channel.description: Recent content in uKnit quickstart on Codetab

item.title: uKnit - CodeTab
item.description: uKnit Quickstart The preferred way to use uKnit in your project is to add it as a dependency in project’s pom.xml. We explain this with uknit-quickstart example and you can use uKnit in your project in the same way. uKnit is also distributed as release zip which contains uKnit core and a Quickstart example projects. For whatever reason, you don’t want to add uknit dependency to your project’s pom then you have to install uKnit from the release zip.
